quiz.question: mislay ____
quiz.explanation: 放错地方, 放错钥匙. She would often mislay her keys and search frantically. 她经常放错钥匙然后疯狂寻找。

quiz.question: waylay _ ________
quiz.explanation: 拦截, 拦截旅行者. Bandits would waylay travelers on the road. 强盗会在路上拦截旅行者。

quiz.question: dismay __ ____
quiz.explanation: 沮丧, 对消息沮丧. She expressed dismay at the bad news. 她对坏消息表示沮丧。

quiz.question: fray __ ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 磨损, 边缘磨损. The old carpet began to fray at the edges. 旧地毯开始在边缘磨损。

quiz.question: foray ____ _______
quiz.explanation: 尝试, 尝试进入市场. The company made a foray into foreign markets. 公司尝试进入外国市场。

quiz.question: __ disarray
quiz.explanation: 混乱, 处于混乱. The room was in complete disarray. 房间处于完全混乱状态。

quiz.question: __ astray
quiz.explanation: 迷路, 走迷路. The hiker managed to go astray in the forest. 徒步旅行者在森林里迷路了。

quiz.question: giveaway _____
quiz.explanation: 赠品, 赠品奖品. The radio station offered a giveaway prize. 广播电台提供了赠品奖品。

quiz.question: straightaway ______
quiz.explanation: 立即, 立即获胜者. He was the straightaway winner of the race. 他是比赛的立即获胜者。

quiz.question: throwaway ____
quiz.explanation: 随口说的, 随口说的台词. The actor delivered a funny throwaway line. 演员说了一句有趣的随口台词。

quiz.question: flyaway ____
quiz.explanation: 飞散的, 飞散的头发. Static electricity caused flyaway hair. 静电导致飞散的头发。

quiz.question: ____ headway
quiz.explanation: 进展, 取得进展. The project began to make headway. 项目开始取得进展。

quiz.question: passageway ____
quiz.explanation: 走廊, 走廊门. A narrow passageway led to the door. 一条狭窄的走廊通向门。

quiz.question: _____ archway
quiz.explanation: 拱门, 石拱门. They passed through a beautiful stone archway. 他们穿过一个美丽的石拱门。

quiz.question: _____ doorway
quiz.explanation: 门口, 前门口. She stood in the front doorway waving goodbye. 她站在前门口挥手告别。

quiz.question: motorway _______
quiz.explanation: 高速公路, 高速公路交通. Motorway traffic was heavy during rush hour. 高峰时段高速公路交通繁忙。

quiz.question: sway ______
quiz.explanation: 摇摆, 轻轻摇摆. Trees would sway gently in the breeze. 树木会在微风中轻轻摇摆。

quiz.question: ______ alleyway
quiz.explanation: 小巷, 狭窄的小巷. They walked through a dark narrow alleyway. 他们穿过一条黑暗狭窄的小巷。

quiz.question: ____ _ lullaby
quiz.explanation: 催眠曲, 唱催眠曲. The mother would sing a lullaby to her baby. 母亲会给婴儿唱催眠曲。

quiz.question: scabby ____
quiz.explanation: 结痂的, 结痂的膝盖. The child had a scabby knee from falling. 孩子因跌倒而有结痂的膝盖。

quiz.question: shabby _________
quiz.explanation: 破旧的, 破旧的待遇. He received shabby treatment from his employer. 他受到雇主的破旧待遇。

quiz.question: flabby ____
quiz.explanation: 松弛的, 松弛的手臂. Lack of exercise gave him flabby arms. 缺乏锻炼使他有松弛的手臂。

quiz.question: tabby ___
quiz.explanation: 斑猫, 斑猫. The orange tabby cat slept in the sun. 橙色斑猫在阳光下睡觉。

quiz.question: cobwebby _______
quiz.explanation: 布满蜘蛛网的, 布满蜘蛛网的角落. The attic had dusty cobwebby corners. 阁楼有满是灰尘和蜘蛛网的角落。

quiz.question: knobby _____
quiz.explanation: 多节的, 多节的膝盖. The old man had knobby knees from arthritis. 老人因关节炎而有多节的膝盖。

quiz.question: scrubby ______
quiz.explanation: 矮小的, 矮小的灌木. Only scrubby bushes grew in the desert. 沙漠中只有矮小的灌木生长。

quiz.question: grubby _____
quiz.explanation: 肮脏的, 肮脏的手. The child had grubby hands from playing outside. 孩子因在外面玩耍而有肮脏的手。

quiz.question: stubby _______
quiz.explanation: 短粗的, 短粗的手指. He had short stubby fingers. 他有短粗的手指。

quiz.question: lacy _____
quiz.explanation: 蕾丝的, 蕾丝连衣裙. She wore a delicate lacy dress to the party. 她穿着精致的蕾丝连衣裙去参加派对。

quiz.question: _____ lunacy
quiz.explanation: 疯狂, 纯粹的疯狂. The plan was sheer lunacy. 这个计划是纯粹的疯狂。

quiz.question: ____ captaincy
quiz.explanation: 队长职位, 队队长职位. He was awarded the team captaincy. 他被授予队队长职位。

quiz.question: ____ idiocy
quiz.explanation: 愚蠢, 纯粹的愚蠢. His decision was pure idiocy. 他的决定是纯粹的愚蠢。

quiz.question: beady ____
quiz.explanation: 珠子般的, 珠子般的眼睛. The bird watched with small beady eyes. 鸟用小珠子般的眼睛观察。

quiz.question: _____ malady
quiz.explanation: 疾病, 致命的疾病. The patient suffered from a fatal malady. 病人患有致命的疾病。

quiz.question: giddy ______
quiz.explanation: 眩晕的, 眩晕的高度. Standing at that giddy height made her nervous. 站在那个眩晕的高度让她紧张。

quiz.question: shoddy _____
quiz.explanation: 劣质的, 劣质的商品. The store was selling shoddy goods. 这家商店出售劣质商品。

quiz.question: ruddy ______
quiz.explanation: 红润的, 红润的脸颊. The cold weather gave him ruddy cheeks. 寒冷的天气使他有红润的脸颊。

quiz.question: reedy _____
quiz.explanation: 尖细的, 尖细的声音. The old man spoke in a thin reedy voice. 老人用细尖的声音说话。

quiz.question: tweedy ______
quiz.explanation: 花呢的, 花呢夹克. The professor wore a traditional tweedy jacket. 教授穿着传统的花呢夹克。

quiz.question: moldy _____
quiz.explanation: 发霉的, 发霉的面包. The moldy bread had to be thrown away. 发霉的面包必须扔掉。

quiz.question: mouldy ______
quiz.explanation: 发霉的, 发霉的奶酪. The mouldy cheese smelled terrible. 发霉的奶酪闻起来很可怕。

quiz.question: bandy _____
quiz.explanation: 争论, 争论言辞. They would bandy words in heated arguments. 他们会在激烈的争论中争论言辞。

quiz.question: disembody ______
quiz.explanation: 脱离肉体, 脱离肉体的灵魂. A disembodied spirit haunted the mansion. 一个脱离肉体的灵魂在豪宅出没。

quiz.question: foolhardy ____
quiz.explanation: 鲁莽的, 鲁莽的举动. Climbing without rope was a foolhardy move. 不用绳子攀登是鲁莽的举动。

quiz.question: gaudy ______
quiz.explanation: 俗丽的, 俗丽的服装. She wore a gaudy outfit with too many colors. 她穿着颜色太多的俗丽服装。

quiz.question: rowdy _____
quiz.explanation: 吵闹的, 吵闹的人群. The rowdy crowd cheered loudly at the concert. 吵闹的人群在音乐会上大声欢呼。

quiz.question: disobey ______
quiz.explanation: 不服从, 不服从命令. Soldiers who disobey orders face punishment. 不服从命令的士兵面临惩罚。

quiz.question: volley __ _____
quiz.explanation: 齐射, 一齐射. A volley of shots rang out in the battle. 战斗中响起了一齐射。

quiz.question: paisley _______
quiz.explanation: 佩斯利花纹, 佩斯利花纹. The tie had a colorful paisley pattern. 领带有彩色的佩斯利花纹。

quiz.question: ____ _ curtsey
quiz.explanation: 屈膝礼, 行屈膝礼. The girl would make a curtsey before the queen. 女孩会在女王面前行屈膝礼。

quiz.question: matey ____
quiz.explanation: 友好的, 友好的语气. He spoke in a matey tone with colleagues. 他用友好的语气与同事说话。

quiz.question: gluey ____
quiz.explanation: 胶粘的, 胶粘的混乱. The spilled glue created a gluey mess. 洒出的胶水造成了胶粘的混乱。

quiz.question: leafy ______
quiz.explanation: 树木繁茂的, 树木繁茂的郊区. They lived in a quiet leafy suburb. 他们住在安静的树木繁茂的郊区。

quiz.question: defy ____
quiz.explanation: 违抗, 违抗几率. The athlete managed to defy the odds and win. 运动员成功违抗几率并获胜。

quiz.question: stupefy ______
quiz.explanation: 使麻木, 使感官麻木. The drug would stupefy the senses. 药物会使感官麻木。

quiz.question: __ _ jiffy
quiz.explanation: 瞬间, 在瞬间. I'll be back in a jiffy. 我马上就回来。

quiz.question: sniffy _______
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑的, 轻蔑的评论. She made a sniffy comment about the restaurant. 她对餐厅做了轻蔑的评论。

quiz.question: huffy ____
quiz.explanation: 生气的, 生气的心情. He was in a huffy mood after the argument. 争论后他处于生气的心情。

quiz.question: mollify _____
quiz.explanation: 安抚, 安抚愤怒. Nothing could mollify her anger. 没有什么能安抚她的愤怒。

quiz.question: exemplify _____
quiz.explanation: 举例说明, 举例说明观点. Let me exemplify my point with an example. 让我用一个例子来举例说明我的观点。

quiz.question: dignify ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使有尊严, 使职位有尊严. His presence would dignify the post. 他的存在会使职位有尊严。

quiz.question: electrify ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 使激动, 使人群激动. The rock star's performance would electrify the crowd. 摇滚明星的表演会使人群激动。

quiz.question: petrify ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 使惊呆, 使因恐惧而惊呆. The horror movie would petrify viewers with fear. 恐怖电影会使观众因恐惧而惊呆。

quiz.question: gratify ______
quiz.explanation: 满足, 满足欲望. The gift would gratify his deepest desire. 礼物会满足他最深的欲望。

quiz.question: rectify _____
quiz.explanation: 纠正, 纠正错误. We need to rectify this error immediately. 我们需要立即纠正这个错误。

quiz.question: mortify ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 使羞愧, 使因羞愧而羞愧. The public mistake would mortify him with shame. 公开的错误会使他因羞愧而羞愧。

quiz.question: edgy ____
quiz.explanation: 紧张的, 紧张的氛围. The film had an edgy, unsettling vibe. 这部电影有紧张、令人不安的氛围。

quiz.question: dodgy ____
quiz.explanation: 可疑的, 可疑的交易. That sounds like a dodgy deal to me. 那听起来像是可疑的交易。

quiz.question: pudgy _______
quiz.explanation: 胖乎乎的, 胖乎乎的幼儿. The pudgy toddler waddled across the room. 胖乎乎的幼儿蹒跚地穿过房间。

quiz.question: baggy _____
quiz.explanation: 宽松的, 宽松的裤子. He wore baggy pants that were too large. 他穿着太大的宽松裤子。

quiz.question: shaggy ___
quiz.explanation: 毛茸茸的, 毛茸茸的狗. The shaggy dog needed a haircut. 毛茸茸的狗需要理发。

quiz.question: piggy ____
quiz.explanation: 小猪, 小猪储蓄罐. The child saved coins in a piggy bank. 孩子在小猪储蓄罐里存硬币。

quiz.question: foggy _______
quiz.explanation: 有雾的, 有雾的早晨. It was a cold foggy morning in London. 伦敦的早晨寒冷而有雾。

quiz.question: groggy ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 昏昏沉沉的, 睡眠后昏昏沉沉. He felt groggy from sleep when the alarm rang. 闹钟响时他感到睡眠后昏昏沉沉。

quiz.question: soggy ______
quiz.explanation: 湿透的, 湿透的地面. Rain left the ground soggy and muddy. 雨使地面湿透且泥泞。

quiz.question: muggy _______
quiz.explanation: 闷热的, 闷热的天气. The muggy weather made everyone uncomfortable. 闷热的天气让每个人都不舒服。

quiz.question: mangy ____
quiz.explanation: 患疥癣的, 患疥癣的杂种狗. A mangy mutt wandered the streets. 一只患疥癣的杂种狗在街上游荡。

quiz.question: dingy ____
quiz.explanation: 昏暗的, 昏暗的房间. They met in a dingy basement room. 他们在昏暗的地下室房间见面。

quiz.question: springy ____
quiz.explanation: 有弹性的, 有弹性的步伐. She walked with a springy step. 她以有弹性的步伐行走。

quiz.question: stringy ____
quiz.explanation: 有筋的, 有筋的肉. The cheap cut was tough and stringy. 便宜的肉又硬又有筋。

quiz.question: lethargy ____ __
quiz.explanation: 昏睡, 昏睡开始. After lunch, lethargy sets in. 午饭后,昏睡开始。

quiz.question: screechy ______
quiz.explanation: 刺耳的, 刺耳的刹车. The car's screechy brakes needed repair. 汽车刺耳的刹车需要维修。

quiz.question: paunchy _____
quiz.explanation: 大肚子的, 大肚子. The man had a paunchy belly from overeating. 这个男人因暴饮暴食而有大肚子。

quiz.question: patchy ________
quiz.explanation: 不均匀的, 不均匀的覆盖. The phone had patchy coverage in rural areas. 手机在农村地区有不均匀的覆盖。

quiz.question: scratchy _______
quiz.explanation: 粗糙的, 粗糙的毛衣. The wool sweater was scratchy against her skin. 羊毛毛衣在她皮肤上很粗糙。

quiz.question: tetchy _____
quiz.explanation: 易怒的, 易怒的回答. He gave a tetchy reply to the question. 他对问题给出了易怒的回答。

quiz.question: blotchy ____
quiz.explanation: 有斑点的, 有斑点的皮肤. The rash gave her blotchy skin. 皮疹使她有斑点的皮肤。

quiz.question: grouchy ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 脾气坏的, 脾气坏的老人. The grouchy old man complained about everything. 脾气坏的老人抱怨一切。

quiz.question: touchy _______
quiz.explanation: 敏感的, 敏感的话题. Money is a touchy subject in their family. 金钱是他们家的敏感话题。

quiz.question: doughy _______
quiz.explanation: 面团般的, 面团般的质地. The bread had a soft doughy texture. 面包有柔软的面团般质地。

quiz.question: flashy ___
quiz.explanation: 华而不实的, 华而不实的车. He drove a flashy sports car. 他开着华而不实的跑车。

quiz.question: splashy ________
quiz.explanation: 引人注目的, 引人注目的标题. The tabloid ran a splashy headline. 小报刊登了引人注目的标题。

quiz.question: squashy ______
quiz.explanation: 软烂的, 软烂的番茄. The overripe tomato was soft and squashy. 过熟的番茄又软又烂。

quiz.question: fleshy ______
quiz.explanation: 肉质的, 肉质的叶子. Succulents have thick fleshy leaves. 多肉植物有厚厚的肉质叶子。

quiz.question: fishy _____
quiz.explanation: 可疑的, 可疑的故事. His excuse sounded fishy to me. 他的借口对我来说听起来可疑。

quiz.question: swishy _____
quiz.explanation: 沙沙作响的, 沙沙作响的裙子. She wore a swishy silk skirt. 她穿着沙沙作响的丝绸裙子。

quiz.question: bushy ________
quiz.explanation: 浓密的, 浓密的眉毛. The old professor had bushy white eyebrows. 老教授有浓密的白眉毛。

quiz.question: slushy ____
quiz.explanation: 半融化的, 半融化的雪. Slushy snow covered the streets in spring. 春天半融化的雪覆盖着街道。

quiz.question: earthy ____
quiz.explanation: 朴实的, 朴实的色调. The room was decorated in earthy tones. 房间用朴实的色调装饰。

quiz.question: swarthy __________
quiz.explanation: 黝黑的, 黝黑的肤色. The sailor had a swarthy complexion from years at sea. 水手因多年在海上而有黝黑的肤色。
